Docs.summary: The default UpdateSourceTrigger value of the binding target property. The default value for most dependency properties is PropertyChanged, while the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox.Text%2A> property has a default value of LostFocus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A programmatic way to determine the default <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.UpdateSourceTrigger%2A> value of a dependency property is to get the property metadata of the property using <xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.GetMetadata%2A> and then check the value of the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.DefaultUpdateSourceTrigger%2A> property.
